name: Saman Anurudda
bio: Saman Anurudda is a trusted TILERSHUB Certified Master Tiler from Galle, celebrated for his precision, artistry, and dedication to delivering flawless results. With expertise in floor and wall tiling, bathroom renovations, custom patterns, and premium finishes, his work is defined by a Signature Finish — a perfect blend of durability, elegance, and attention to detail. From modern coastal homes to timeless heritage renovations, his craftsmanship combines technical excellence with a creative edge, ensuring beauty that lasts.

name: Sujith Anurada
bio:
Sujith Anurada
Master Tiler | Owner – Gangula Tile Art Service
TILERSHUB Certified Master Tiler | Government Registered

With a reputation for precision and artistry, Sujith Anurada is the driving force behind Gangula Tile Art Service in Seeduwa, Gampaha. As a TILERSHUB Certified Master Tiler and a Government Registered professional, Sujith brings unmatched expertise to every project.

Specializing in large format tiling, pool tiling, bathroom tiling, and intricate mosaic designs, his work is defined by a Signature Finish that blends technical excellence with aesthetic beauty.

From luxury bathrooms to statement swimming pools, Sujith’s meticulous attention to detail and commitment to quality have made him a trusted choice for homeowners and developers seeking world-class tiling results.
